bio: Senior Frontend Engineer and Angular Architect with 6+ years of experience building scalable enterprise platforms. Led system revamps, optimized performance and implemented reusable UI architectures across multi-client systems.

Experienced in advanced Git strategies, CI/CD automation, and engineering best practices to support scalable team workflows. Actively leveraging AI-assisted development tools to accelerate delivery and improve code reliability.
Recognized for leadership, mentoring, and cross-team technical impact.
